title: Ballad Lover's 15 Years of Best 15 Fan Compilation [93~07]
description:
These are 325 songs I&#039;ve hand-picked from over 4000 songs in my HD (and I only keep songs worth listening again).
I think this will be very useful for people who got into Jpop in recent years, and want to try out older songs.
I always try to get the highest bitrate possible, and majority of songs are in 192kbps or higher.

I couldn&#039;t narrow down as much for 1996, 1997 and 2004~, so they are in 20 or 25 songs, but all are quality songs!
45 notable songs from before 1993 are also included.

I generally like ballads in Jpop, but songs of all genre are included. My tastes are pretty mainstream, so most of the songs are high-ranking Oricon songs that represented each year, but also couple of hidden gems.

Some older songs are pretty rare nowadays, and there are also couple of super rare songs in 320kbps rips by me, such as Lime Light&#039;s "Kisaragi", H2O&#039;s "Omoide ga Ippai", Anri&#039;s "Olivia wo Kikinagara", and Kome Kome Club, Yuming songs.

Enjoy~!
